DOC.brief_summary: The trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate drug drug interaction liraglutide atorvastatin ( Lipitor® ) , lisinopril ( Zestril® ) , griseofulvin digoxin ( Lanoxin® ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Liraglutide Gastrointestinal Absorption Several Drugs Potential Influence Liraglutide Intragastric pH
DOC.criteria: Female subject use adequate anticontraception sterile Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1830 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Good general health judge investigator , base medical history , physical examination include 12lead ECG ( electrocardiogram ) , vital sign blood urinary laboratory assessment Willing capable selfadminister subcutaneous injection History clinically significant renal , hepatic , cardiovascular , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , metabolic , endocrine , haematological , neurological , psychiatric disease major disorder may interfere objective trial , judge investigator Impaired renal function Blood pressure heart rate supine position outside range 90140 mmHg systolic , 5090 mmHg diastolic heart rate 40100 beats/min Any clinically significant abnormal ECG Active hepatitis B and/or active hepatitis C Positive HIV ( human immunodeficiency virus ) antibodies Known suspect allergy trial product ( ) relate product Use prescription nonprescription medication except paracetamol , nasal spray drop nasal congestion , vitamin within 2 week prior first dose entire trial period History alcoholism drug abuse last 12 month Smoking 10 cigarette per day , equivalent tobacco product Habitual excessive consumption methylxanthinecontaining beverage food ( coffee , tea , soft drink cola , chocolate ) judge Investigator
